com.esri.mo2.ui.lyt
Class LayoutActions

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.ui.cmn.Actions
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.ui.lyt.LayoutActions
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClipboardOwner
public class LayoutActions
extends Actions
implements ClipboardOwner

This class defines default actions that could apply to either PageLayout itself or its elements. If a specific element needs to have new actions, those new actions could be added to this class through its addAction APIs. This class alos provides APIs for getting several pre-defined action sets for ElementPopupMenu, MapPopupMenu, LayoutMenu and LayoutToolBar. Notes: currently copy/paste implementation is using a local clipboard set in Layout class. The system clipboard works for Element but not for java.awt.Image. So we have to use a local clipboard in the layout packge for now, which means that the copy/paste functions can't interact with other applications. Currently, only the following actions will fire LayoutActionEvent, COPY, DELETE, UNDO, ALIGN_TO_MARGINS, GRID, SNAP_TO_GRID, GUIDES, SNAP_TO_GUIDES, MARGINS, SNAP_TO_MARGINS, RULERS, SNAP_TO_RULERS, HIDE_RULERS and COPY_MAP_TO_CLIPBOARD

setAlignToMargins

public void setAlignToMargins(boolean alignToMargins)
Sets align to margins to the boolean value. If the given boolean value is different from the the existing value, an AlignToMarginsEvent will be fired.

Parameters:
alignToMargins - the boolean value indicating align to margins to true or false
